org.cornutum.tcases.openapi

Class ConditionReporter<C extends ExecutionContext<?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cornutum.tcases.openapi.ConditionReporter<C>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    InputModeller, RequestCaseResolver, SchemaAnalyzer

    public abstract class ConditionReporter<C extends ExecutionContext<?>>
extends Object
    Base class for objects that detect and report execution conditions.

    • Constructor Summary
